TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscardImageEditingData extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Office2010.Word.OnOffType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2010 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is w14:discardImageEditingData.

remarks.format:
## Remarks *2.3.23 discardImageEditingData*
*Target namespace:* http://schemas.microsoft.com/office/word/2010/wordml
A CT_OnOff element that specifies that when true, the cropped-out areas of the images are not to be saved. Rather, the images saved are the results of applying *imgProps* (as specified in [MS-ODRAWXML] section 2.3.1) on the original images. See section 2.2.2 for how this element integrates with ISO/IEC-29500-1.
If this element is absent or if it has a value of "false", the cropped-out areas of images are saved.
The following W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1) fragment specifies the contents of this element.
*\<xsd:element name="discardImageEditingData" type="CT_OnOff"/>*
See section 5.1 for the full W3C XML Schema ([XMLSCHEMA1] section 2.1).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DiscardImageEditingData class.
